sentence: The Dolphins went 10-6 in the 2020 season, but missed the playoffs with Tagovailoa and Ryan Fitzpatrick splitting time under center.
author: Anthony Riccobono
title: Dolphins Rumors: Tom Brady Pursuit, Throwing Games Alleged In Brian Flores' Lawsuit

sentence: So … could that mean Ryan Fitzpatrick, the Dolphins quarterback at the time, was “that motherf–ker” Brady was talking about?
author: Ryan Glasspiegel
title: Tom Brady’s mystery ‘motherf–ker’ QB might have been Ryan Fitzpatrick

sentence: The Dolphins won five games that season despite unloading a litany of key players, including safety Minkah Fitzpatrick and left tackle Laremy Tunsil.
author: Melissa Jacobs
title: If owners really paid coaches bonuses to lose, the NFL is in big trouble
